Body: How to spot and report scammers on Vernam’s official Telegram group (or any other)  Dear friends and contributors to the Vernam project, Our crowd sale started on May 15th at 06.00h UTC and the fastest contributors got their VRN tokens secured with 40% discount. We are so excited to have you onboard and become part of the future of insurance. There were over 37,000 on the waiting list and the competition was furious, so don’t worry if you have missed the chance to participate in the hot three hours. Until 23.05 you have chance to buy VRN tokens with 20% discount. Anyway, as our Token Sale is gaining popularity and our group is nearing 40,000 people, scammers are sneaking in, thinking of all kinds of dirty tricks to fool people and steal their money. This is why we decided to write a guide how to detect scammers and how to fight them. We are showing examples from the Vernam Telegram channel, but they are applicable to any group. When you join a Telegram group, always start by reading the pinned message. Sometimes it may be boring, but usually you will see all the important ant up-to-date information there.  Most Telegram groups list their admins on the pinned message. Always check the usernames of the admins in the pinned message and whenever you doubt you are chatting with an admin, check their nickname on the profile info.  Real Bob vs. Fake Bob and how to spot them Why admins will never DM you first?  Definitely scam Vernam group’s admins and most Telegram group admins are forbidden to write directly to the members of the group. It is a measure against scammers and it is what scammers usually do. The typical scammer will mimic admin’s profile and hit random members of the group on DM, trying to convince them to make transactions to different addresses. Admins will never ask you personal data on Telegram, also ask you for wallet addresses and similar Remember, if you are interested in the project, the only way we will collect your data is through our dashboard. All admins can help you with on the group is: Instructions Brief info about the project, the dashboard, the bounty program, etc. What to do if you spot a scammer? If you spot a scammer, pretend you trust him and act cool. Make screenshots and send to real admins, so that they can take proper measures and kick him out of the group. Questions? Join other nearly 40,000 supporters on our Telegram Group! Our administrators will be online 24/7 answering important questions regarding the token sale and Vernam, so please do not hesitate to ask! At Vernam, we’ve beyond excited to start revolutionizing insurance. Will you join us and help make transparent, secure, automated insurance a reality?

Body: Technologically, Vernam is decentralized online platform, based on blockchain technology which creates the right conditions for clients and insurance providers to do business in an easy, safe and cost-efficient way. Besides the platform itself, a proprietary off-chain market place will use the Vernam token (VRN) — an Ethereum-based ERC 20 standard crypto token — to take full advantage of the platform’s functionality. In other words, when a contract between a client and an insurance provider is signed on Vernam, it will be denominated in VRN. Since there is no broker mediation, the standard broker’s commission (15–25%) will be awarded to the client in the form of VRN. The Client can choose to exchange the VRN for fiat money or to keep it and later purchase a new insurance with a significant discount. The system will offer special type of smart contracts, guaranteeing that when a defined set of events occurs, the client will automatically be compensated with a certain amount of VRN’s. This will make Vernam the game changer who dared to digitalize the insurance market! Vernam will also be the safest and the cheapest tool to purchase insurance.

Body: How to buy VRN tokens with 40% discount PreSale is starting in 24 hours and this is your guide how to join https://s7.postimg.cc/8frztsix7/1_-_V4q_KWgrq_Ogreld_C4_Kidfw.jpg  Dear friends and contributors to the Vernam project,  Our crowd sale is starting in less than 24 hours and we are so excited to have you onboard and become part of the future of insurance.  We will open crowd sale on Tuesday, May 15th at 06.00h UTC and you will have chance to buy VRN tokens with 40% discount, but it won’t be easy, so take your time to read our instructions and get ready.  (Important ) The Leaderboard To contribute to the Vernam project, you have to register and get whitelisted on our custom Contributors’ dashboard. Whitelist is closing today!   This is our whitelist dashboard. It has everything you need to become a Vernam contributor and participate in our VRN token sale.  On the left you will see your menu. It includes:  Information about your profile — option to enable two-factor identification, change your password, enter your details that will be needed to enter crowdsale and see the history of your logins. Your refferal ID. Give your refferal link to friends and prospect contributors and you will gain points for the Whitelist Leaderboard. Buy tokens and Transactions history Bounty program — you can get up to 200 VRN tokens airdrop if you complete all actions in the airdrop program. KYC — it will be mandatory to pass a KYC if you want to become Vernam contributor  On the dashboard you will receive points for every action you take. The more points you get, the higher you will climb our leaderboard.   When you apply for the whitelist and claim what approximate sum you are going to invest, you’ll receive 100 points For joining our Telegram channel you will get 200 points For following @vernamofficial on Twitter or liking our Facebook page, your award will be 100 points. Each user you bring via your refferal link will add 50 points to your score. If you deposit 0.01 ETH, you will get 500 points. The sum will be held and given back to you in VRN tokens when the sale begins. Note that your deposit will be safe — we won’t be able to withdraw it or use if for anything but a sole deposit. First come, first served When the sale begins on Tuesday, May 15th at 06.00h UTC the ones who have deposited 0.01ETH will be the ones to have the chance to buy VRN tokens, followed by the top-scorers on the leaderboard. If two people have the same points, the one who signed earlier will have priority when buyng.  How to Contribute 1. Login to our contributors’ dashboard.   2. Click “Buy Tokens” on the menu on the left.  3. Enter the amount of ETH you’d like to contribute. It should be the equivalent of more than 0.1 ETH. We will accept ETH, BTC and USD (Visa and Mastercard). https://s7.postimg.cc/egpor3igr/1_3-h_Zsdgl_P5_WFVt_XYbv_Jh_HQ.jpg  4. If you haven’t entered your details yet, the system will re-direct you to your profile settings: https://s7.postimg.cc/5lougr95n/image.jpg  5. Carefully enter your wallet’s address. You have one chance only!!! https://s7.postimg.cc/8ttbt9sp7/image.png  Do not use Coinbase address or similar. We accept MEW (MyEtherWallet) only. 6. You will receive the address you have to send your contribution to: https://s7.postimg.cc/720cyhby3/image.png  Copy the address and deposit the sum. Use only MEW(MyEtherWallet) or similar accounts. Never use exchange accounts. This image is for illustrative purpose only. You can send even less than 25 ETH. 7. When you finish your transaction, add the VCT as a custom token to MyEtherWallet. https://s7.postimg.cc/v5r4mvpaz/image.jpg  “How To Add a Custom Token to MyEtherWallet” 8. You will see the corresponding amount of VCT tokens in your wallet: https://s7.postimg.cc/j3vqstg3f/image.jpg  The VCT token in MyEtherWallet VCT — our anti-fraud guarantee for you during the campaign As you already know, the Vernam token is called VRN. In order to prevent possible attacks of wallets during the campaign, we introduced another token in our smart contracts — it is called VCT — Vernam Crowdsale Token.  VCT is what everyone will be getting during the campaign. The only purpose of this token is to guarantee that after the end of the campaign you will be able to convert it in VRN token. It can’t be transferred and you can’t use it for anything else.  This is why it won’t be interesting for hackers to try to steal it.  But how do I know I’ll get my real VRN tokens after the crowdsale? Everything about our token sale is transparent and so are our smart contracts — You can check them on GitHub.  You will see that the two tokens are identical, but the VCT one is of no use other than to be converted to VRN after the crowd sale and if KYC is passed.  https://medium.com/@vernam.official/how-to-buy-vrn-tokens-with-40-discount-97aacd8785fa [/quote]  Is there any restriction for the ico? Title: [ANN][ICO]⚡Vernam- The World's 1st 0% commission insurance ⚡ [SOFT CAP REACHED]
Body: After the Vernam platform is operational, customers will be able to purchase conventional insurance products through a broker network – including proprietary Vernam brokers. Sales and claim compensations will be covered through the platform, while risk analysis, claim adjustment and examination will be provided by the insurance company. Communication between Vernam and the insurer will be real-time and completely automated.  Purchasing process will start with a request from the customer. The platform will return quotes from participating brokers and insurance companies, which will be denominated in Vernam tokens. If accepted, depending on the availability of VRN in the customer’s wallet, either the quoted amount will be transferred to Vernam / third party broker, or the required VRN tokens will be purchased from a digital exchange. An insurance contract will be created, where information will be retrieved from the shared ledger, or provided / updated from the client.  When insurance products are purchased through our dedicated broker network, clients will receive a VRN-denominated incentive, approximately equal to the standard broker commission for the specific type of insurance (typically, around 20%). A minor share will be retained for platform maintenance and to cover additional operating costs. This will increase the appeal of the Vernam platform to potential customers, thus creating a positive network effect. The Vernam tokens could be exchanged for fiat money, or kept for future VRN-denominated purchases. As discussed earlier, direct purchase of insurance products in Vernam tokens will be cheaper by an amount, equal to the abovementioned incentive, which will also stimulate the development of the platform and its tokenized economy. When a client signs an insurance contract on the platform a small floating fee* will be deducted from the reward for the operation. The revenue from this fee collection and advertising will be used to run the business and cover operational costs.

Author: vernam
Title: [ANN][ICO]⚡Vernam- The World's 1st 0% commission insurance ⚡ [SOFT CAP REACHED]
Body: Besides platform development, we plan to establish a proprietary network of brokers across a number of EU countries.  • Our network of brokers will initially target the biggest EU insurance markets, UK, Austria, Belgium and Italy among them. • The first markets we will enter will be the “crypto-friendly” ones, securing the fast adoption of our platform. • Our main focus will be Switzerland, considered by many to be Europe’s “Crypto Nation”  While we aim to digitalize the insurance industry, the current regulatory landscape requires that many steps of the insurance process would still go through a licensed intermediary.With time, brokers and agents would join the Vernam platform, as it provides an increasing access to customers across the continent and – with development of the shared ledger – a mechanism to estimate customer risk and optimize premium calculations. Nevertheless, to stimulate platform development and customer adoption, we would develop our own broker network, guaranteeing control over the complete insurance contracting process.  Two strategies are possible – the establishment of brand new broker companies, or the acquisition of existing ones. The first path is cheaper, but might require a longer planning horizon, as many licensing and legal steps might take a significant amount of time. Acquiring an existing broker is more expensive, but has the added benefits of inheriting the existing relationships with insurers and with clients. While the latter is important, we believe that releasing the value-added back to end customers (through the return of the “traditional” brokerage commission) would stimulate client adoption – especially in an industry where customer loyalty is not very high. Therefore, a good marketing strategy and an effective and intensive promotional campaign will be more important than acquiring an existing broker’s client portfolio. Acquiring the relationship between brokers and insurers, on the other hand, is of primary importance, as it will allow a faster and more efficient operations roll-out. Our interviews with industry experts have confirmed that setting up the documentary and administrative relationship for a new broker might take up to a year.

Title: [ANN][ICO]⚡Vernam- The World's 1st 0% commission insurance ⚡ [SOFT CAP REACHED]
Body: Vernam will transform insurance into a transparent, efficient, and accessible playing field. With so many ICOs on the market, you have to pick and choose which ones to back carefully. And the most important question to ask is this: Does this ICO provide real, lasting value?  There’s no question about it — Vernam definitely does. Insurers agree that insurance is facing huge changes — there’s a real mismatch between how the insurance industry operates and the amazing potential offered by new technological capabilities. But while many InsurTechs are focusing on expanding the insurance value chain, Vernam is here to disrupt it entirely.  And this kind of big-picture thinking is what’s badly needed.  Insurance is plagued by a few main issues, and Vernam solves all of these: slow processes involving too many intermediaries, lack of freedom of choice because of barriers to transparent product information, painstaking personal information verification, high costs due to the general inefficiency built into the system.  By leveraging blockchain, the insuring process will see huge benefits in terms of time & effort involvement. Private data will be secure and more quickly available, which will not only speed up insurance purchases, but also claims and payout.  And more than that, when insurers have access to verified, detailed, and personalized data, they’ll be able to offer more relevant and tailored products for their clients. It’s a win-win for both insurers and regular people who need insurance.  You’ll save big on commission fees — because there aren’t any.  Intermediaries like brokers and agents typically take big commissions — up to 30% — on every policy they sell. With Vernam, we take these intermediaries out of the equation completely and that cost goes down to 0%. It’s that simple.  Participants in the marketplace receive a bonus with every policy purchase.  Every policy purchased will include a bonus of up to 30% of your policy premium distributed in VRN.  Where does this come from and why? See point 2 above. We’d like to reward the end-clients instead of agents and brokers, and incentivize everyone to jump bravely into the future of insurance.  Beyond financial rewards, as a purchaser of insurance you’ll also gain another important thing — agency. We connect end-customers directly with insurers, meaning that if you’re looking to buy insurance, you’ll have unprecedented access to review and choose the best policy for your needs.  The VRN token has a built-in value appreciation mechanism. All insurance transactions on the Vernam platform operate with VRN tokens. To make this happen, the Vernam team will be buying VRN tokens from the market.  And by buying tokens from the participating exchanges in order to reward clients, we will create a constant demand for the VRN token.  Vernam will launch an innovative crypto insurance product, Crypto Safe (CS), thus providing a future-thinking alternative to traditional insurance.  While disrupting the structure of insurance is no small feat, at Vernam, we’re thinking big and not stopping there. We’ll partner with insurance providers across national borders to provide our own unique crypto insurance product, with our goal being to up the game even more.  What’s new with Crypto Safe?  End-to-end digital process — fast & automated Smart contract — guaranteed correctness towards the client Transparent premiums and coverage policy When no damage is claimed, the CS smart contract will return a defined percentage of the premium to the client in VRN tokens Not only is Crypto Safe offering a smoother, faster, more transparent experience for the end-clients, it’s also incentivizing prevention of accidents & claims.

Title: [ANN][ICO]⚡Vernam- The World's 1st 0% commission insurance ⚡ [SOFT CAP REACHED]
Body: Technologically, Vernam is decentralized online platform, based on blockchain technology which creates the right conditions for clients and insurance providers to do business in an easy, safe and cost-efficient way. Besides the platform itself, a proprietary off-chain market place will use the Vernam token (VRN) — an Ethereum-based ERC 20 standard crypto token — to take full advantage of the platform’s functionality.  In other words, when a contract between a client and an insurance provider is signed on Vernam, it will be denominated in VRN. Since there is no broker mediation, the standard broker’s commission (15–25%) will be awarded to the client in the form of VRN. The Client can choose to exchange the VRN for fiat money or to keep it and later purchase a new insurance with a significant discount.  The system will offer special type of smart contracts, guaranteeing that when a defined set of events occurs, the client will automatically be compensated with a certain amount of VRN’s. This will make Vernam the game changer who dared to digitalize the insurance market! Vernam will also be the safest and the cheapest tool to purchase insurance.  Given the lack of transparency and the resulting misinformation, or loss of trust between end customers, insurance providers, and intermediaries, such as brokers and agents, we are confident that the decentralized nature of the blockchain technology will help to recover the lost balance and will provide a platform, driven by shared data and mutual trust, while at the same time the clients may benefit from reducing administrative cost of the insurance products.   The blockchain sub-system of Vernam, is system of inter-related smart contracts.  It has two main purposes:  • Create Insurance Smart Contracts as a proof of the issuance of insurance and its details  • Transfer a commission back in the form of VRN Tokens  Read detailed description of the implementation of blockchain on the Vernam platform in our whitepaper: https://www.vernam.com/assets/uploads/Whitepaper_Beta_v015.pdf

Title: [ANN][ICO]⚡Vernam- The World's 1st 0% commission insurance ⚡ [SOFT CAP REACHED]
Body: Through our concept, Vernam will solve one of the hardest issues to tackle in the current state of the industry — the loss of trust between end customers, insurance providers and intermediaries (brokers and agents), resulting from the speculative value of the middlemen’s services (for which they receive generous commissions)and the “hidden” information regarding the exact percentage offered to them as a reward by the different insurers — information which reveals why a client might be offered to accept an insurance proposal which does not suits best his needs.  When the middleman is out of the game, his commission (an average of 15–20% of the overall insurance cost) will be returned to the client in the form of Vernam tokens as an incentive for using the platform. This means Insurance will become much cheaper and the clients will always get the best proposal for them.  In this way Vernam will also eliminate the possibility for “bad quality” insurance products to be spread only because the insurer is offering high commissions to the agents. The insurance market will become absolutely fair as the middle men’s self interest will not play a role and the insurers will not be able to exploit it for the mass distribution of speculative proposals. In a fair market the real quality offers will always win.  Vernam’s mission is to transform the insurance market into a transparent, fair and honest space of integrity and high social values!

Technologically, Vernam is decentralized online platform, based on blockchain technology which creates the right conditions for clients and insurance providers to do business in an easy, safe and cost-efficient way. Besides the platform itself, a proprietary off-chain market place will use the Vernam token (VRN) — an Ethereum-based ERC 20 standard crypto token — to take full advantage of the platform’s functionality.  In other words, when a contract between a client and an insurance provider is signed on Vernam, it will be denominated in VRN. Since there is no broker mediation, the standard broker’s commission (15–25%) will be awarded to the client in the form of VRN. The Client can choose to exchange the VRN for fiat money or to keep it and later purchase a new insurance with a significant discount.  The system will offer special type of smart contracts, guaranteeing that when a defined set of events occurs, the client will automatically be compensated with a certain amount of VRN’s. This will make Vernam the game changer who dared to digitalize the insurance market! Vernam will also be the safest and the cheapest tool to purchase insurance.  Given the lack of transparency and the resulting misinformation, or loss of trust between end customers, insurance providers, and intermediaries, such as brokers and agents, we are confident that the decentralized nature of the blockchain technology will help to recover the lost balance and will provide a platform, driven by shared data and mutual trust, while at the same time the clients may benefit from reducing administrative cost of the insurance products.   The blockchain sub-system of Vernam, is system of inter-related smart contracts.  It has two main purposes:  • Create Insurance Smart Contracts as a proof of the issuance of insurance and its details  • Transfer a commission back in the form of VRN Tokens  Read detailed description of the implementation of blockchain on the Vernam platform in our whitepaper. Title: [ANN][ICO]⚡Vernam- The World's 1st 0% commission insurance ⚡ [SOFT CAP REACHED]
Body: Besides platform development, we plan to establish a proprietary network of brokers across a number of EU countries.  • Our network of brokers will initially target the biggest EU insurance markets, UK, Austria, Belgium and Italy among them.  • The first markets we will enter will be the “crypto-friendly” ones, securing the fast adoption of our platform.  • Our main focus will be Switzerland, considered by many to be Europe’s “Crypto Nation”  With time, brokers and agents would join the Vernam platform, as it provides an increasing access to customers across the continent and – with development of the shared ledger – a mechanism to estimate customer risk and optimize premium calculations. Nevertheless, to stimulate platform development and customer adoption, we would develop our own broker network, guaranteeing control over the complete insurance contracting process.  Two strategies are possible – the establishment of brand new broker companies, or the acquisition of existing ones. The first path is cheaper, but might require a longer planning horizon, as many licensing and legal steps might take a significant amount of time. Acquiring an existing broker is more expensive, but has the added benefits of inheriting the existing relationships with insurers and with clients. While the latter is important, we believe that releasing the value-added back to end customers (through the return of the “traditional” brokerage commission) would stimulate client adoption – especially in an industry where customer loyalty is not very high. Therefore, a good marketing strategy and an effective and intensive promotional campaign will be more important than acquiring an existing broker’s client portfolio.  Acquiring the relationship between brokers and insurers, on the other hand, is of primary importance, as it will allow a faster and more efficient operations roll-out. Our interviews with industry experts have confirmed that setting up the documentary and administrative relationship for a new broker might take up to a year.

Title: [ANN][ICO]⚡Vernam- The World's 1st 0% commission insurance ⚡ [SOFT CAP REACHED]
Body: Hello Doctor-Coin.  Your interest to the project  is appreciated. Your comments, too.  Let us try to answer your remarks:  1. Vernam platform will connect end-customers and the insurance brokers providing services on a current local market. The platform will be initially operated by Vernam itself. Vernam will update such data step by step on the basis of the relations it enters into with the different insurance companies operating on the different markets. Also because we are situated in a EU country and this will give Vernam advantage to grow quickly and build strong foundations for the business worldwide.  3. About the German health law - I suppose there might be some misunderstanding. Vernam does not plan to have health or life insurance products on the early stages of our platform.  We believe that with the exponential development of technology, the  disruption of the insurance market is inevitable and it's just a matter of time.
